experiences.description: Worked as a Back-end Web Developer at this Market Research & Data Analytics Company. Conducted Software Development & Maintenance for the custom tools and web applications for the organization. Worked in PHP(Laravel), Javascript and other relevant Frameworks

Worked as a freelance web developer and developed B2B organization web applications, B2B data analytics platform and content management system as software products in online marketplaces. Holds active expertise in Web Development, System Maintenance.
